Gatling_Gun.display_help: You are taking continuous damage over time from the Gatling Gun.
Gatling_Gun.display_target_help: You are taking continuous damage over time from the Gatling Gun.

Flamethrower.display_help: The Flamethrower has set you on fire. You are taking Fire damage over time.
Flamethrower.display_target_help: The Flamethrower has set you on fire. You are taking Fire damage over time.

Personal_Force_Field.display_help: The Force Field is virtually impenetrable to all attacks. The impact of some powerful attacks may occasionally rattle Duray, however the Force Field will hold, and Duray will not suffer any damage or effects from the attacks. The Force Field works both ways, and while active, Duray can only affect himself with other powers.
Personal_Force_Field.display_target_help: The Force Field is virtually impenetrable to all attacks. The impact of some powerful attacks may occasionally rattle Duray, however the Force Field will hold, and Duray will not suffer any damage or effects from the attacks. The Force Field works both ways, and while active, Duray can only affect himself with other powers.

Dispersion_Bubble.display_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_target_help: Creates a large bubble which protects all allies inside. While active, the Dispersion Bubble gives all allies within increase defense to all attacks except psionic. The Dispersion Bubble also protects allies inside from Immobilization, Disorient and Hold effects.
Dispersion_Bubble.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from most damage types with a {PowerName}.

Protection_Shield.display_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.display_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.display_target_help: The Protection Shield protects others from smashing, lethal, fire, cold, energy and negative energy attacks for a limited time. The magnetic nature of the shield makes attacks less likely to land and affect your ally. Multiple Shields can be stacked on one target to improve the defense.
Protection_Shield.display_target_short_help: Ally +DEF(Smash, Lethal, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative)
Protection_Shield.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} protects you from physical attacks with a {PowerName}.

Resistance.display_help: Fake Nemesis is an automaton that is resistant to Sleep, Fear, Confusion, and Psionic Damage. It's steam powered armor makes it vulnerable to cold damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Psionic
Resistance.display_target_help: Fake Nemesis is an automaton that is resistant to Sleep, Fear, Confusion, and Psionic Damage. It's steam powered armor makes it vulnerable to cold damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Psionic

Resistance.display_help: Since they are machines, Jaeger's are immune to Sleep and Fear powers and resistant to Disorient, Confuse and psionic damage.
Resistance.display_short_help: Self Auto, Res Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Disorient
Resistance.display_target_help: Since they are machines, Jaeger's are immune to Sleep and Fear powers and resistant to Disorient, Confuse and psionic damage.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Self Auto, Res Sleep, Fear, Confuse, Disorient

Explode.display_help: When Jaegers are destroyed, they tend to explode.
Explode.display_target_help: When Jaegers are destroyed, they tend to explode.

Jaeger_Saw.display_help: You are taking continuous damage over time from the Jaeger Saw.
Jaeger_Saw.display_target_help: You are taking continuous damage over time from the Jaeger Saw.

Jaeger_Gun.display_help: You are taking continuous damage over time from the Jaeger Gun.
Jaeger_Gun.display_target_help: You are taking continuous damage over time from the Jaeger Gun.

Gas_Grenade.display_help: The Jaeger can fire an exploding gas grenade at great range. Any foes trapped within the gas will slowly take damage from the poison.
Gas_Grenade.display_target_help: The Jaeger can fire an exploding gas grenade at great range. Any foes trapped within the gas will slowly take damage from the poison.

Lance_Rifle.display_help: An extremely long range and very accurate weapon. Fires an explosive round that can knock down its target. The explosive round has a small area of effect.
Lance_Rifle.display_target_help: An extremely long range and very accurate weapon. Fires an explosive round that can knock down its target. The explosive round has a small area of effect.

Vengeance.display_help: The loss of a good leader enrage the team. If a Officer falls in battle, he can grant his teammates a bonus to their defense, their to hit, and their damage with his last breath.
Vengeance.display_target_help: The loss of a good leader enrage the team. If a Officer falls in battle, he can grant his teammates a bonus to their defense, their to hit, and their damage with his last breath.
Vengeance.display_victim_hit: You fallen teammate has inspired you with {PowerName}.

Bayonet.display_help: The blade at the front of the Nemesis Rifle is a nasty weapon.
Bayonet.display_target_help: The blade at the front of the Nemesis Rifle is a nasty weapon.

Nemesis_Rifle.display_help: The Nemesis Rifle is a basic long range fire arm. Fires a burst of 3 shots at a targeted foe at good range and is very accurate.
Nemesis_Rifle.display_target_help: The Nemesis Rifle is a basic long range fire arm. Fires a burst of 3 shots at a targeted foe at good range and is very accurate.

Triage.display_help: The Nemesis soldiers use this battle field syringe to heals a single targeted ally of some Hit Points. The serum can also free an ally from any Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a brief time. Should be performed away from combat as this power can fail if interrupted.
Triage.display_target_help: The Nemesis soldiers use this battle field syringe to heals a single targeted ally of some Hit Points. The serum can also free an ally from any Immobilization, Sleep, Disorient and Hold effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a brief time. Should be performed away from combat as this power can fail if interrupted.

Gatling_Gun_Burst.display_help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of firing its Gatling Gun arm is a massive burst to cause Moderate Lethal damage and reduce its target's defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Gatling_Gun_Burst.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Gatling Gun Burst!

Gatling_Gun_Sweep.display_help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of firing its Gatling Gun arm is a sweeping burst to cause Moderate Lethal damage to foes in a wide cone. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Gatling_Gun_Sweep.display_target_help: Your defense has been reduced by the Gatling Gun Sweep!

Saw_Swipe.display_help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of delivering a crushing blow from its drill arm causing High Smashing damage and Moderate Lethal damage over time. Foes that are struck will also be knocked back and disoriented for a short time. Damage: High, Moderate DoT, Recharge: Moderate
Saw_Swipe.display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Moderate DoT(Lethal), Foe Disorient, Knockback

Pandora_Beam_Tell.display_help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of releasing a devastating beam of energy of energy that deals tremendous amounts of damage. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Pandora_Beam_Tell.display_target_help: You've been targeted by the Nemesis Monstrosity!
Pandora_Beam_Tell.display_attacker_attack_floater: The Nemesis Monstrosity prepares to fire its Pandora Beam!

Pandora_Beam.display_help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of releasing a devastating beam of energy of energy that deals tremendous amounts of damage. Damage: Superior
Pandora_Beam.display_target_help: You're suffering Energy damage over time from the Pandora Beam!

Foot_Stomp.display_help: The Nemesis Monstrosity can slam its mighty fists into the ground causing heavy damage as well as knocking down and disorienting its targets. Recharge: Slow
Foot_Stomp.display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockdown, Disorient

Gas_Grenade.display_help: The Nemesis Storm Rifle can fire an exploding gas grenade at great range. Any foes trapped within the gas will slowly take damage from the poison.
Gas_Grenade.display_target_help: The Nemesis Storm Rifle can fire an exploding gas grenade at great range. Any foes trapped within the gas will slowly take damage from the poison.

Resistance.display_help: The Organized Nemesis Soldiers are resistant to Fear and Confusion.
Resistance.display_target_help: The Organized Nemesis Soldiers are resistant to Fear and Confusion.

Bayonet.display_help: The blade at the front of the Nemesis Storm Rifle is a nasty weapon.
Bayonet.display_target_help: The blade at the front of the Nemesis Storm Rifle is a nasty weapon.

Resistance.display_help: WarHulk's are immune to Fear, Confuse, Disorient and KnockBack, but their bulk makes them vulnerable to Immobilization.
Resistance.display_short_help: Self Auto, Res Fear, Confuse, Disorient, KnockBack
Resistance.display_target_help: WarHulk's are immune to Fear, Confuse, Disorient and KnockBack, but their bulk makes them vulnerable to Immobilization.
Resistance.display_target_short_help: Self Auto, Res Fear, Confuse, Disorient, KnockBack

Explode.display_help: When Warhulks are destroyed, they tend to explode.
Explode.display_target_help: When Warhulks are destroyed, they tend to explode.

Pummel.display_help: The WarHulk has a built in Claw that can shred foes.
Pummel.display_target_help: The WarHulk has a built in Claw that can shred foes.

Flamethrower.display_help: The Warhulk's Flamethrower is doing Fire damage over time to you.
Flamethrower.display_target_help: The Warhulk's Flamethrower is doing Fire damage over time to you.
